Announcing our new Collections

Welcome to Fitness Clothes

Here you can find clothes of your own choice

Our Brand Story

Our legacy lies in our root strengths; vibrant colours, design aesthetics that mirror our emotions, fashion that is ever evolving, and an unforgettable retail experience. Since its inception, Fitness Clothes has been making it possible for women and men to dress in an inspiring, vibrant, affordable way whilst celebrating their uniqueness with every style, stitch and weave.

Culture
Fitness Clothes believes that culture, values, mindsets are in a constant state of evolution, and we strive to keep transforming with it.

Uniqueness
We provide unique and different clothes from other brands and this is our speciallity

Modern Clothes

That is what keeps us relevant to the modern and contemporary clothes

Our Brand Asset Transformation

Fitness Clothes is evolving, progressing, changing it is dynamic. This natural progression is driven by the realization that the brand needs to be responsive to changing customer needs, their lifestyle and of course the environment.

Shop Collection

Specifications

The walnut wood card tray is precision milled to perfectly fit a stack of Focus cards. The powder coated steel divider separates active cards from new ones, or can be used to archive important task lists.

Material Quality
All garments are made from premium, ethically sourced materials to ensure durability and comfort
Sustainability Standards
Our packaging is made from recycled materials, and we incorporate sustainable fabrics like Tencel and bamboo in our clothing lines
Inclusive Sizing
Our jeans are available in sizes ranging from 00 to plus-size 24, ensuring that everyone can find the perfect fit
Timeless Design Aesthetics:
The classic trench coat in our collection is a versatile piece that can be worn year-round, embodying timeless elegance
Ethical Production Practices:
Our manufacturing partners undergo regular audits to guarantee safe working conditions, and we proudly support initiatives promoting fair labor practices.
Innovative Technology Integration
Our activewear line features moisture-wicking fabric that utilizes advanced technology to keep the wearer dry during intense workouts, promoting both style and performance.

Meet our leadership

Our vision is to revive the ancient craft of handloom and reinterpret it within a more contemporary and fashion-focused context. Our innovative retail strategy and response to trends and consumer demand have turned Fitness Clothes into a global fashion retailer with over 15 stores in locations such as Pakistan, the UAE and the UK. The company offers a wide range of products, including Ready To Wear, Fabrics (Man and Woman), and Homemade clothes
